# 防抖

function debounce(fn, delay) {
  let timer = null;
  
  return function () {
    if(timer != null) {
      clearTimeout(timer);
    }
    timer = setTimeout(() => {
      fn.call(this);
    }, delay);
  }
}

# 节流

function throttle(fn, delay) {
	let flag = true;
  return function () {
    if(flag) {
      setTimeout(() => {
        fn.call(this);
        flag = true;
      }, delay);
    }
    flag = false;
  }
}

# 延迟队列

function delayQueue(fn, delay) {
  let cnt = 0;

  setInterval(() => {
    if (cnt > 0) {
      fn();
      cnt--;
    }
  }, delay);

  return function () {
    cnt++;
  };
}

# once

function once(fn) {
  let flag = true;
  return function() {
    if(flag) {
      fn.call(this);
      flag = false;
    }
  } 
}
